code: import React from'react';import{FaTrophy,FaMedal,FaAward}from'react-icons/fa';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Leaderboard=_ref=>{let{leaderboard}=_ref;const getRankIcon=index=>{switch(index){case 0:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTrophy,{style:{color:'#FFD700',fontSize:'1.2rem'}});case 1:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaMedal,{style:{color:'#C0C0C0',fontSize:'1.2rem'}});case 2:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaAward,{style:{color:'#CD7F32',fontSize:'1.2rem'}});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:'1.2rem',fontWeight:'bold'},children:index+1});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginBottom:'1.5rem'},children:"\uD83C\uDFC6 Leaderboard"}),leaderboard.length>0?leaderboard.map((user,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"leaderboard-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'1rem'},children:[getRankIcon(index),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontWeight:'600'},children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:'0.9rem',color:'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)'},children:user.schoolName})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontWeight:'bold',color:'#FF6B35'},children:[user.totalViews," views"]})]},user._id)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',padding:'1rem',color:'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)'},children:"No data available"})]});};export default Leaderboard;
